Texts.Chs:
强壮的爬虫类人。具有弹性，十分灵活，在陆地和水下都能茁壮成长。
两栖的生活增加了它们的能量储备，但抗寒性弱于陆地上的爬行动物。

食性：杂食性，包括生肉

^orange;天赋^reset;：
^green;+40%^reset; Max Food, ^green;+6% Speed^reset;, ^green;+11% Jump^reset;
^green;+40%^reset; Poison, ^green;+10%^reset; Cosmic and ^green;+10%^reset; Radioactive Resist
^green;+1100^reset; oxygen, Swim Boost.
Immunity: Poison

^orange;环境^reset;：
Gain ^green;+25%^reset; Health, ^green;+15%^reset; Speed on Bog, Swamp, and Strange Sea biomes.


^orange;武器^reset;：
Spears: ^green;+10%^reset;  Damage, ^green;+10%^reset;  Protection
Short Spears: ^green;+10% Damage^reset;, ^green;+15%^reset; Crit Damage
Crossbows/Harpoons: ^green;+15% Damage^reset;, ^green;+5%^reset; Crit Damage

^red;虚弱^reset;：
^red;-12%^reset; Health, -5%^reset;Energy
^red;40%^reset; Ice, ^red;20%^reset; Electric
Texts.Eng:
Sturdy reptilian people. They are resilient and agile, with the ability to thrive both on land and underwater. Amphibious life has increased their natural energy stores, but they are less hardy than land-based reptiles.

Diet: Omnivorous, But can eat Raw Meat. 

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Max Food x^green;1.4^reset;, Defense x^green;1.05^reset;
  Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Poison, +^green;10^reset;% Cosmic & Radioactive
  +^green;1100^reset; Oxygen, Swim Boost.
  ^green;0.1^reset;% Health Regen
  Immunity: Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  Bog, Swamp, and Strange Sea biomes
    Health x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears: Damage & Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Short Spears: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  Crossbows/Harpoons: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.88^reset;, Energy x^red;0.95^reset;
  Resist: -^red;40^reset;% Ice, -^red;20^reset;% Electric
